title: What are the negatives of getting a flu shot?
author: Dr Monika Korff Allergist; Immunologist Columbia; MD
description: My son is 12 years old. I want to know what are the negatives of getting a flu shot? Learn more from our experts.

I want to know what are the negatives of getting a flu shot? 1 Answer [Dr. Monika Korff](/Expert/2897350-Monika-Korff)Allergist & Immunologist Columbia, MD The primary issue will be that without the vaccination he has a much higher risk for severe complications from the flu. The vaccine may have some side effects but they are usually mild. We advise every patient - child and adult - to receive the seasonal influenza vaccine. Monika Korff, MD
